import React, { useRef } from "react"; import NavBar from "./NavBar"; import NavBar_2 from "./NavBar_2"; import "./Main.css"; import FadeIn from "react-fade-in"; import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer"; import foto from "../images/zweite_buli.jpg"; function Main() { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ threshold: 0, }); const homeRef = useRef(); const quotenRef = useRef(); const date = new Date(); const dateOptions = { weekday: "short", year: "numeric", month: "2-digit", day: "numeric", }; return (
Willkommen zu BetSmart!
BESTE QUOTEN
KEINE WETTSTEUER
KEINE LIMITIERUNG
100% FREIHEIT
{/* {inView ? : } */}
Beste Quoten
{date.toLocaleDateString("de-DE", dateOptions)}
2. BUNDESLIGA
HAMBURGER SV - WERDER BREMEN
); } export default Main;
